'''''The Firey Hue of the Scorching Sun''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must reach the Max Level of the [[Tona's Flame's Restitution|Tablet of Tona]] in the [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]].
